paper_keywords: systems of functional differential and functional equations
paper_abstract: This paper is concerned with the numerical solution of initial value problems for linear systems of functional differential and functional equations. The adaptation of Rosenbrock methods is considered. It is shown that, under some reasonable assumptions, A-stability Rosenbrock methods can preserve the asymptotic stability of underlying linear systems. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Asymptotic stability of Rosenbrock methods for systems of functional differential and functional equations
